title: Add ntfy notifications for parallel agent execution
description: Send ntfy notifications when parallel agents are spawned and when they complete. Helps track multi-agent PRD execution.

acceptanceCriteria.text: SETUP: Log worktree location to execution.log
Add notifyParallelStart(topic, agentCount, storyId) to ntfy.ts
Add notifyParallelComplete(topic, agentCount, successCount, storyId) to ntfy.ts
Include agent IDs in notification body
Use tags: parallel, robot for parallel notifications
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
CLEANUP: Commit in worktree: feat: US-118 add parallel ntfy notifications
CLEANUP: Push worktree branch to origin
CLEANUP: Return to master branch in main repo before completing
